name: Huangshan
desc: A guard for hire. She specializes in protecting cargo.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"These cards remind me of strong fighters I've heard of in my line of work. Hmm. How about we have a duel to emulate a showdown between great warriors?"
As Huangshan opens her Casket of Tomes, a deck comprised of "Tartaglia," "Mirror Maiden," and "Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage" is revealed.
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Instead of using your own deck, you will be using "Surprise Deck: Luminous Tenacity" to engage in this challenge.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc:
"Childe" Tartaglia

Should this table be considered a battlefield, then may the strongest claim the win.

customize.name: Mirror Maiden
customize.desc:
"Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Enovy

All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightnessâ€¦

customize.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
"Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage

And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

value.name: Adventurer's Experience
value.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 5000 EXP.
These experiences are very beneficial for journeys into the unknown.
